reviewText: These episodes are a riot. So much fun to watch.

The Featured Guest Series is brand new and a winner so far. If you've forgotten how manic Robin Williams could be in an interview setting, this disc will remind you. It features three episodes, one with Robin and his idol, Jonathan Winters.

And for those who've felt that the Tonight Show Orchestra hasn't gotten its full props on these "Tonight Show" DVDs, one of the episodes features Tommy Newsome and the orchestra in a full performance.
